official_title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, DC, as the "Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr., Federal Building".

summary.text: Redesignates the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, D.C., serving as the headquarters of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, as the Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr., Federal Building.

titles.title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, DC, as the "Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr., Federal Building".
